com.esri.mo2.ui.dlg
Class ModalPopUpLauncher

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.dlg.ModalPopUpLauncher
public class ModalPopUpLauncher
extends Object

Displays a modal popup Dialog in a separate thread.

This class is useful for producing modal popup messages when the parent application is an Applet running within Internet Explorer (IE). In this situation, if a JavaScript application causes the Java applet to popup a modal dialog within the same Thread as the JavaScript code, then the modal dialog can cause IE to hang or crash. By using ModalPopUpLauncher instead, the popup is run within a separate Thread and does not cause IE any problems.
